name: Contentul Microsite Demo
description: An example NodeJS (Express.js) microsite that is configurable with Contentful an API-first, cloud-based platform

CONTENTFUL_API_SPACE_ID.description: Space Id for the Contentful Space

CONTENTFUL_API_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Access Token for the Contentful Space

CONTENTFUL_MICROSITE_ENTRY_ID.description: Entry ID of the Microsite configuration
